original_text: And in the fifteenth day of this month is the feast: seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
korean_text: 또 그 달 열다섯째 날부터는 명절이니 이레 동안 무교병을 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And in the fifteenth day of this month
seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.
sentences.korean_translation: 칠 일 동안 누룩 없는 떡을 먹어야 합니다.
